text: vyaktamaya telivukalumayi mump yusuph ninnalute atutt vannu. appeal addeham keantuvanna sandesannalil ninnal sansayiccukeanteyirunnu. addeham maranamatannappeal ninnal parannu: “iddehattinusesam allahu iniyearu dutaneyum ayakkukaye ille”nn. ivvidham atiruvitunnavareyum sansayalukkaleyum allahu valiketilakkunnu
